uchicago.src.sim.topology
Interface ModifyableTopology

All Superinterfaces:
RelationTopology
All Known Subinterfaces:
Graph
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGraph, AbstractObject2DTopology, AbstractObject3DTopology, DefaultModifyableTopology, OccupationTopology
public interface ModifyableTopology
extends RelationTopology

This intefaces is an extension of the basic topology that adds the ability to add and remove relationships. This behaviour was separated out to account for topology types, like the basic spatial relationships, that are defined by context (and perhaps Context as well), not by explicitly creating a relationship.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Tom Howe
